Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored for Scotland in the 33rd minute
Igor Matanovic equalized for Croatia three minutes later
Andrej Kramaric headed Croatia ahead in the 70th minute
Che Adams had a goal disallowed for offside in added time
Pre-Game Insights: Steve Clarke's depleted squad with over a dozen players injured
Ben Doak started for Scotland on loan from Liverpool
Craig Gordon played as goalkeeper for Scotland after a long absence
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke expressed frustration with the VAR decision
Scotland struggles in the Nations League with only one win in 15 matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: Che Adams replaced Lyndon Dykes late in the game
